Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கெடாஅ வழிவந்த கேண்மையார் கேண்மை விடாஅர் விழையும் உலகு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: They will be loved by the world, who have not forsaken the friendship of those with whom they have kept up an unbroken long-standing intimacy.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: Two very old friends are shown, their bond of friendship ('கேண்மை') having come down through a long, unbroken path of history ('கெடா வழிவந்த').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Their defining quality is that they have never forsaken each other ('விடாஅர்'). This loyalty is visualized as them holding onto an ancient, glowing, unbreakable bond of light between them.
Layered_Composition.Background: Because of this incredible, lifelong loyalty, the world itself ('உலகு'), personified by a diverse crowd of people from all nations, is shown looking upon them with great love, admiration, and desire ('விழையும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The world loves and desires those who maintain their unbroken, long-standing friendships without ever forsaking them.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The long, historical path and the ancient, unbreakable bond of light represent the long-standing friendship. The adoring gaze of the personified 'World' is the reward for this loyalty.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Loyal, admirable, enduring, loved by all.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A warm, golden, nostalgic light illuminates the two friends and their ancient bond. The adoring world is bathed in this respectful glow.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide shot that includes the two friends, their bond, and the adoring world, telling the whole story.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Idealized realism, with a mythological feel.

Cultural_Anchors: The world will desire them ('விழையும் உலகு')

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: friends forsaking each other, a broken bond, an angry world, text artifacts.
